## RefreshTokenResponse interface

Describes the expected result from a refresh token command

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RefreshTokenResponse 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [accessToken](./state-auth.refreshtokenresponse.accesstoken.md) | [AccessToken](./state-auth.accesstoken.md) | A new access token |
|  [refreshToken](./state-auth.refreshtokenresponse.refreshtoken.md) | string | The refresh token used to make the request |
